responsabilities: Responsible for designing, developing and maintaining web pages dedicated to reservations and payments of transportation services, maintenance of a CRM to manage bookings, vehicles, mails for a transportation company at the cancun airport.

Responsible for web ecommerce designing and maintaining
Development and Maintenance of the company's CRM
Web Team leader, I take technical decisions about which technologies use in each project and how the team will works.
